title: Retribution: The Ballad of Darane: Book 1
description: Nations are at peace - for now.The teachings of Aerokin talk of evil which will infect and consume everything it touches - and of a woman with the power to save or condemn all.The Ballad of Darane chronicles the journey of a woman with a destiny and power she does not understand or want, as she struggles to cope with the brutality of the world she inhabits.
author: Tir Cey
